author: soyboy_vegan
content:
Can someone sanity check me that the Sepolia activation is Feb 12th and Holesky activation is Feb 19th? I've seen some conflicting tweets and articles that have this date swapped:

- https://www.galaxy.com/insights/research/ethereum-all-core-developers-consensus-call-149/
- https://etherworld.co/2025/01/23/highlights-of-ethereums-all-core-devs-meeting-acdc-149/
